title: KUNG FU PANDA 4
desc: Kung Fu Panda 4 is fun for the whole family -- maybe not as much fun as the first three, but still a good time. Read audience reviews

title: Fallout
desc: Fallout is the story of haves and have-nots in a world in which there’s almost nothing left to have. Two-hundred years after the apocalypse, the gentle denizens of luxury fallout shelters are forced to return to the irradiated hellscape their ancestors left behind—and are shocked to discover an

title: Sonic 3
desc: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 continues the high-speed adventures of Sonic as he teams up with his friends to battle new threats. The movie picks up after the events of Sonic the Hedgehog 2, with Sonic and Tails facing off against Dr. Robotnik, who joins forces with a new powerful adversary, Shadow the Hedgehog. As the stakes rise, Sonic must embrace his powers and unite with his allies to save the world. Packed with action, humor, and heart, Sonic 3 promises to deliver an exciting ride for fans of all ages
